LRE.MC.long_name: Lar España Real Estate SOCIMI, S.A.

The company, which aims to invest in the Spanish real estate sector, especially in the retail segment. Today it is the Spanish market leader in retail, with nearly 600,000 square meters for rent and 1,509 million euros in asset value. MEQA.F.summary: MERLIN Properties SOCIMI, SA, one of the main real estate companies listed on the Spanish Stock Exchange (IBEX-35), has as its main activity the acquisition and management of tertiary real estate assets in the Iberian Peninsula. The Company is a public limited company incorporated as a SOCIMI. The main activity of the Company is the acquisition, active management, operation and selective rotation of quality commercial real estate assets in the investment segment ÂCoreÂ and ÂCore PlusÂ, mainly in Spain and, to a lesser extent, in Portugal. The Company focuses on the office, retail and logistics market.

YAP67.MC.summary: Ap67 Socimi, S.A. engages in the acquisition and management of real estate assets in Spain. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Leganes, Spain.

YCPS.MC.summary: As of December 20, 2016, Castellana Properties Socimi, S.A. (BME:YCPS) operates as a subsidiary of Vukile Property Fund Limited.

YEIS.MC.summary: As of August 29, 2017, Socimi Eurosic Investment Spain operates as a subsidiary of Batipart SAS.

YGOP.MC.summary: Grupo Ortiz Properties SOCIMI, S.A. engages in managing and leasing real estate assets in Spain. Its portfolio consists of 100,000 square meters for rent that compose of various categories of assets, such as housing, office buildings, commercial premises, warehouses, service stations, and parking areas. The company is based in Madrid, Spain. Grupo Ortiz Properties SOCIMI, S.A. is a subsidiary of Ortiz Construcciones y Proyectos, S.A.

YHLY.MC.summary: Hadley Investments SOCIMI, S.A.U. engages in the acquisition, leasing, and management of residential, office, and commercial properties in Spain. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in CornellÃ  de Llobregat, Spain.

YHSP.MC.summary: Hispanotels Inversiones Socimi S.A. invests in the hotel, office, residential, and commercial real estate markets. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.

YINM.MC.summary: Inmofam 99 Socimi, S.A., an investment company, engages in the rental of real estate properties in Madrid. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.

YMEI.MC.summary: Mercal Inmuebles Socimi, S.A. is engaged in leasing and managing real estate properties. Its portfolio consists of stores, offices, hospitals, land, and garages. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.

YNUM.MC.long_name: Numulae Gestión de Servicios SOCIMI, S.A.
YNUM.MC.summary: Numulae GestiÃ³n de Servicios SOCIMI, S.A. operates as a real estate company in Spain. The company operates 35 commercial premises, 9 kiosks, and 3 terraces distributed over a total area of 6,978.25 m2 located in the El ArcÃ¡ngel Shopping Center, CÃ³rdoba. Numulae GestiÃ³n de Servicios SOCIMI, S.A. is based in Madrid, Spain.

YPARK.MC.long_name: Inmobiliaria Park Rose Iberoamericana SOCIMI, S.A.
YPARK.MC.summary: Inmobiliaria Park Rose Iberoamericana SOCIMI, S.A. engages in leasing of commercial properties and office buildings in Spain and the United States. The company is based in Barcelona, Spain.

YTRA.MC.summary: Trajano Iberia Socimi, S.A. is a real estate investment trust. Trajano Iberia Socimi, S.A. is based in Madrid, Spain.

YVIT.MC.summary: Vitruvio Real Estate Socimi, S.A. owns a portfolio of real estate properties for rent, primarily in the center of Madrid, Barcelona, and the Basque Country, Spain. It manages office and residential buildings, as well as commercial premises. The company has elected to be taxed as a real estate investment trust. As a result, it would not be subject to corporate income tax on that portion of its net income that is distributed to shareholders. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

YZBL.MC.summary: Zambal Spain Socimi, S.A. operates as a subsidiary of IBA Capital Partners.
